article_title: The World Is Going to Hell, but This Video Is Awesome
article_text:
The World Is Going to Hell, but This Video Is Awesome

Yes, the world is in terrible shape. Everything from #mizzou to Syria to Obamacare to you name it. Still, I defy you to watch this video and not smile:

As the kids say, amirite?
